attributes.action: lower the time terrorist suspect can be held back to 28 days
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the current 42 day rate is a basic intrusion into our civil rights. they'll start with terroists but it'll soon be used for normal crimes. we are the people who will suffer because of this, we have to stop it

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
